name: file-icons
description: Assign file extension icons and colours for improved visual grepping

atom.file-icons.description: Display file-specific icons in tabs and tree view

onChanges.title: Only colour when changed
onChanges.description: Show different icon colours for modified files only. Requires that project be a Git repository.

defaultIconClass.title: Default icon class
defaultIconClass.description: CSS class added to files that lack an icon.

iconMatching.description: Advanced settings for dynamic icon assignment.

changeOnOverride.title: Change on grammar override
changeOnOverride.description: Change a file's icon when manually assigning a grammar.

checkHashbangs.title: Check hashbangs
checkHashbangs.description: Allow lines like `#!/usr/bin/perl` to affect icons.

checkModelines.title: Check modelines
checkModelines.description: Allow [Vim](http://vim.wikia.com/wiki/Modeline_magic) and [Emacs](https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs/manual/html_node/emacs/Specifying-File-Variables.html#Specifying-File-Variables) modelines to change icons.

ignoreCacheOnStartup.title: Ignore cache on startup
ignoreCacheOnStartup.description: Don't reuse cached modelines and hashbangs from previous sessions.

verboseLogging.title: Verbose logging
verboseLogging.description: Print detailed debugging feedback to the console. Requires restart.
